directions: Combine the flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt. Add the egg, oil, and milk. Drop in the huckleberries, mix, and pour the batter into the cups of a greased muffin tin. Top with a crumble of cinnamon, butter, and brown sugar (to taste), and bake at 400ºF for about 20 minutes.
title: Huckleberry Muffins
